s0502: Twelve years, wang with Liang wang meet Lin Jin.
s0503: Common long Ji attack Zhao, capture Zhao general Zhuang.
s0505: Thirteen years, common long Zhang strike Chu at Dan Yang, capture its general Qu Gai, cut head eighty thousand;
s0506: Again attack Chu Han Zhong, take earth six hundred li, set Han Zhong jun.
s0507: Chu surround Yong Shi, Qin make common long Ji help Han yet east attack Qi, reach Man help Wei attack Yan.
s0508: Fourteen years, attack Chu, take Zhao Ling.
s0509: Dan, Li minister, Shu prime Zhuang kill Shu hou come descend.
s0510: Hui wang die, son Wu wang establish.
s0511: Han, Wei, Qi, Chu, Yue all guest follow.
s0512: Wu wang first year, with Wei Hui wang meet Lin Jin.
s0514: Zhang Yi, Wei Zhang all east exit at Wei.
s0516: Two years, initial set Cheng Xiang, Qiang Li Ji, Gan Mao become left right Cheng Xiang.
s0518: Three years, with Han Xiang wang meet Lin Jin outer.
s0519: Nan Gong Jie die, Qiang Li Ji prime Han.
s0520: Wu wang tell Gan Mao said: 'Sha ren desire use carriage pass three Chuan, spy Zhou chamber, die not regret.'
s0521: Its autumn, make Gan Mao, common long Feng attack Yi Yang.
s0522: Four years, pull Yi Yang, cut head six thousand.
s0525: Wu wang have force good play, force scholar Ren Bi, Wu Huo, Meng Yue all reach big official.
s0526: Wang with Meng Yue raise ding, break Bin.
s0529: Wu wang take Wei woman become queen, no son.
s0530: Establish different mother younger brother, is Zhao Xiang wang.
s0531: Zhao Xiang mother Chu person, surname Mi clan, number Xuan tai hou.
s0532: Wu wang die time, Zhao Xiang wang become pledge at Yan, Yan person send return, get establish.
s0533: Zhao Xiang wang first year, Yan jun Ji become prime.
s0536: Common long Zhuang with ministers, feudal lords, Gong Zi become reverse, all punish, reach Hui Wen hou all not able good die.
s0537: Dao Wu wang hou exit return Wei.
s0539: With Chu wang meet Huang Ji, with Chu Shang Yong.
s0542: Five years, Wei wang come court Ying Ting, again with Wei Pu Ban.
s0543: Six years, Shu hou Hui reverse, Si Ma Cuo pacify Shu.

s0549: Eight years, make general Mi Rong attack Chu, take Xin Shi.
s0550: Qi make Zhang Zi, Wei make Gong Sun Xi, Han make Bao Yuan together attack Chu Fang Cheng, take Tang Mian.
s0551: Zhao break Zhong Shan, its jun flee, finally die Qi.
